name: Poly Soldiers
description:
In 2019, Terrorists are trying to attack important place. As soldiers, our plan is defensing this place agaisn't terrorists. There's much people living in that place and our biggest mission is defensing this place even if we know we gonna die. We're the best soldier team that can do this.


In game, there's two bomb sides. One is A and one is B. We need to defense positions and don't let them plant their bomb. But, if they plant the bomb. It will have about 40 secs to defuse. We need to defuse the bomb. At round starts, you'll need to choice your weapons. Game runs in round system. You need to complete at least 10 rounds to win the game. See you there soldier!


  • Two different rifles
  • Two different pistols
  • One Sniper
  • One Map
  • SinglePlayer agains't AIs
  • Multiplayer Deathmatch
